text.p: English and Scottish soccer
fixtures for Saturday, August 16:
English premier league - No matches scheduled
Division one - Charlton v Oxford, Crewe v West Bromwich,
Portsmouth v Port Vale, Reading v Swindon, Stockport v Bury,
Tranmere v Queens Park Rangers, Wolverhampton v Sheffield
United.
Division two - Bournemouth v Wigan, Brentford v
Chesterfield, Bristol City v Blackpool, Burnley v Gillingham,
Carlisle v Watford, Plymouth v Grimsby, Preston v Millwall,
Walsall v Fulham, Wrexham v Oldham, Wycombe v Northampton, York
v Bristol Rovbers.
Division three - Barnet v Exeter, Brighton v Macclesfield,
Cambridge United v Rotherham, Cardiff v Chester, Doncaster v
Peterborough, Hartlepool v Colchester, Hull v Notts County,
Lincoln v Shrewsbury, Rochdale v Mansfield, Scunthorpe v Leyton
Orient, Torquay v Scarborough.
Scottish Premier division - Celtic v Dunfermline, Hearts v
Aberdeen, Motherwell v St Johnstone.
Division one - Falkirk v Ayr, Morton v Hamilton, Partick v
Dundee, Raith v Airdrieonians, St Mirren v Stirling.
Division two - Brechin v Inverness C. Thistle, Clyde v
Forfar, East Fife v Stenhousemuir, Livingston v Stranraer, Queen
of the South v Clydebank.
Division three - Albion v Berwick, Alloa v Cowdenbeath,
Arbroath v East Stirling, Dumbarton v Montrose, Ross County v
Queen's Park.
Playing Sunday, August 17:
Scottish Premier - Dundee United v Hibernian.
